tool_description: Analyzes genetic ancestry composition by comparing SNP data against reference populations to estimate ethnic and geographic origins.

analysis_method.description: Analysis method: admixture, pca, structure, faststructure

window_size.description: Window size in SNPs for local ancestry analysis (50-1000)

minimum_segment_length.description: Minimum segment length in cM for ancestry blocks

include_recent_ancestry.description: Include analysis of recent (last 500 years) ancestry

error_messages: Invalid reference populations: Ensure all population names are recognized.
Unsupported analysis method: Use one of [admixture, pca, structure, faststructure].
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.5 and 0.99.
Invalid window size: Value must be between 50 and 1000 SNPs.
Invalid segment length: Minimum segment length must be between 1.0 and 50.0 cM.
Insufficient SNP overlap: Not enough markers overlap with reference populations.
usage: Specify reference_populations for comparison and choose analysis_method. Adjust confidence_threshold and window_size based on desired resolution and accuracy.

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each ancestry assignment
